name: test_account_negative_scenarios[]
description:
Test negative scenarios like Missing Fields.
    Uses 'accounts_api_manager' to authenticate, proving that even valid users
    cannot send invalid data (422 Unprocessable Entity).

parameters.name: row
parameters.value: {'tags': 'smoke;regression;sit', 'scenario': 'missing fields', 'account_holder_name': '', 'dob': '', 'gender': 'Male', 'email': 'john.doe@example.com', 'phone': '+1-555-0199', 'address': '123 Main St, New York, NY', 'zip_code': '576225', 'account_type': 'Savings', 'balance': '1000.50', 'status': 'Active', 'services': 'Internet Banking,Debit Card', 'marketing_opt_in': 'true', 'updated_account_holder_name': 'John Doe Updated', 'updated_dob': '1990-01-21', 'updated_gender': 'Female', 'updated_email': 'john.new@example.com', 'updated_phone': '+1-555-0199', 'updated_address': '456 New Ave, New York, NY', 'updated_zip_code': '566006', 'updated_account_type': 'Current', 'updated_balance': '5000.00', 'updated_status': 'Active', 'updated_services': 'Internet Banking', 'updated_marketing_opt_in': 'false'}
